mapper.select: SELECT HL_IDX ,HL_TITLE ,HL_LINK ,HL_TARGET ,HL_SORT ,HL_FILE_NAME ,HL_FILE_ORG_NAME ,HL_FILE_PATH ,USE_YN ,REG_DT ,REG_ID ,MOD_DT ,MOD_ID ,HL_MO_FILE_NAME ,HL_MO_FILE_ORG_NAME ,HL_MO_FILE_PATH FROM EZ_HOT_LIST ORDER BY USE_YN DESC, HL_SORT
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EZ_HOT_LIST ORDER BY USE_YN DESC, HL_SORT
SELECT HL_FILE_NAME ,HL_FILE_ORG_NAME ,HL_FILE_PATH FROM EZ_HOT_LIST WHERE HL_IDX = #{hlIdx}
SELECT HL_IDX ,HL_SORT FROM EZ_HOT_LIST WHERE HL_SORT = (SELECT NVL(MIN(HL_SORT),#{hlSort}) FROM EZ_HOT_LIST WHERE HL_SORT > #{hlSort} AND HL_SORT != 0)
SELECT HL_IDX ,HL_SORT FROM EZ_HOT_LIST WHERE HL_SORT = (SELECT NVL(MAX(HL_SORT),#{hlSort}) FROM EZ_HOT_LIST WHERE HL_SORT < #{hlSort} AND HL_SORT != 0)

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT HL_IDX ,HL_TITLE ,HL_LINK ,HL_TARGET ,HL_SORT ,HL_FILE_NAME ,HL_FILE_ORG_NAME ,HL_FILE_PATH ,USE_YN ,REG_DT ,REG_ID ,MOD_DT ,MOD_ID ,HL_MO_FILE_NAME ,HL_MO_FILE_ORG_NAME ,HL_MO_FILE_PATH , @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 RN FROM EZ_HOT_LIST B WHERE (@ROWNUM:=0)=0 AND 1 = 1 )A WHERE rn BETWEEN 1 AND 10
